title: PM’s Coordinator for providing constructive opportunities to youth
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 18 (APP):Coordinator to the Prime Minister on Kashmir Affairs, Gilgit-Baltistan (GB), and States and Frontier Regions (SAFRON, Shabbir Ahmed Usmani has reiterated the government’s commitment, under the leadership of Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif, to create constructive opportunities for the youth at all levels.At prize distribution ceremony after final of bowling match here, he emphasized the importance of providing positive and healthy entertainment opportunities to the youth.He stressed that such efforts enable young people to channel their talents into productive activities, fostering personal and national development.During the ceremony, Usmani expressed his appreciation for the modern recreational facilities.The event was further enlivened by the presence of popular TikTok star Patloo, whose appearance delighted the young attendees and added to the festive atmosphere. The PM’s Coordinator along with his son Hussain Shabbir Mayo, attended the ceremony organized by prominent social figure Taimur Jadoon.
